page.title: 09How I Spend Sundays
page.content: On Sunday morning I rise at 10.30am and have my breakfast.At 12 Noon I leave to go to play in a Football Match for my team.After the game I come back home and have something to eat and drink. I then usually watch a Film either on the television or on the Video until 5.30pm when I have my Tea.I often have Roast Beef,Roast Potatoes,Yorkshire Pudding and Mushrooms. After my Tea I go out to play and when I come in I have my supper and watch That's Life on Television.I then go to my bed at 10pm.
